text: KGPC-LP is a low power radio station broadcasting in a community radio format from Oakland, California. ==History== KGPC-LP began broadcasting on February 6, 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Mass media in Oakland, California GPC-LP GPC-LP GPC-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in California Category:Community radio stations in the United States
title: KGPC-LP
